green: Census in past 15 years or is due in next 2 years
green-lighter: Last census more than 15 years ago

green: Survey in past 5 years or due in next year
green-lighter: Last survey more than 5 years ago

green-dark: 3 or more surveys in past 10 years
green-lighter: 1 or no surveys in past 10 years

green: Survey in past 5 years or due in next year
green-lighter: Last survey more than 5 years ago

green-dark: Operational: more than 75% of births are registered
green: Expanding: more than 40% of births registered
green-lighter: No system or less than 40% of births are registered

green-dark: Operational: more than 75% of deaths are registered
green: Expanding: some data provided to vital statistics
green-lighter: No operational system or no data provided to vital statistics

green-dark: National coverage of all health facilties
National coverage of all education facilties
